text: MOD pizza is doing alot of things right. Great atmosphere. Good food and friendly service. Lots of options but without sacrificing quality. My family has gone to this location 7 or 8 times and every time has been a delight. Enjoy some hood pizza here and try the classic pizzas.

text: Delicious pizza, make it how you want. Always get great service when i come to this location.  Staff is always engaging and oizza is aways fresh. Thank you Mod!

name: Simon Dekker
text: Mod Pizza is a great place to get a quick, good tasting pizza. I have gone to a few of the Mod Pizza establishments and like the food and the surroundings for a quick meal. They allow you to make a custom pizza or you can try one of their specialties. It's all good!

name: Dominique Jean
text: Always fresh, always delicious and the staff if so sweet and generous. I dont know her name but the young lady at the register with lavender hair is so awesome each time I see her. Thank you for a great meal and great service each time!

name: Joshua Kinnick
text: Stopped by for their National Teacher Appreciation Week promotion, which was absolutely awesome! Buy one get one free in honor of teachers, as well as some student recognition awards with a coupon for free pizza! Thanks guys...great pizza and great service!

name: debra carlson
text: Healthy, fast, fresh pizza. Great staff.

name: Brad Garcia
text: I love this place! I feel at home there. Great staff and management especially! I come here like everyday lol. Great pizza and beer. Check them out guys!

Finished product was burned in spots, while toppings could be "cooked" a bit longer. Clean and inviting location.

And if you can't figure out what to get, there are preselected options as well! Definitely coming back for more!
